conclusion: We introduce the first method to compute uvs \ on implicit surfaces 	extbf{without discretization} \ 	extbf{in real time}
appli: It enables to combine the advantages of implicit \ 	extbf{and} explicit representations
limitations: Limitation : Very complex geometry $ightarrow$ lot of seeds \ $ightarrow$ decrease in performance
futurwork: Future work: Automatic generation of seeds\ and merging graph
